com.hazelcast.map.listener

Interface MapClearedListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener, MapListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EntryListener<K,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractReplicatedMapAddEntryListenerMessageTask, ClientConsoleApp, ConsoleApp, EntryAdapter, EntryListenerConfig.MapListenerToEntryListenerAdapter, MapListenerAdapter, ReplicatedMapAddEntryListenerMessageTask, ReplicatedMapAddEntryListenerToKeyMessageTask, ReplicatedMapAddEntryListenerToKeyWithPredicateMessageTask, ReplicatedMapAddEntryListenerWithPredicateMessageTask, ReplicatedMapAddNearCacheListenerMessageTask

    public interface MapClearedListener
extends MapListener
    Invoked after all entries are removed by IMap.clear().
    Since:
    3.5

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mapCleared(MapEvent event)
      Invoked when all entries are removed by IMap.clear().

    • Method Detail

      • mapCleared

        void mapCleared(MapEvent event)
        Invoked when all entries are removed by IMap.clear(). When a listener is registered as local-only then it will be invoked if and only if the clear() method is called on the same instance where the listener was registered to.
        Parameters:
        event - the map event invoked when all entries are removed by IMap.clear()
